name: Aspect Figures
description:
This game is a simple user controlled visualization game where you use a physics based system to push around 2D shapes in a zero-gravity world space. The concept of the game is to be relaxing, so no heavy thought is required to play.  The player-controlled-object, the background, and all the shape's colors can be chosen, and customized from a near-infinite archive of colors. The speed and size of the player-controlled-object can also be customized. The only controls in the game are WASD or the arrow keys.

Please keep in mind that this is a very experimental build.
